raw: Wat Chalong has several pretty temples in good condition and no They were in the process of renovating some of the outsides but it didn't effect the experience. raw: Buddhist temple with excellent architecture. There is no entry ticket. Both sleeping and sitting statues of Buddha are present inside hall. The temple itself is eye catching with 3 floors. View is excellent and local people offer food to fishes and piegions.

raw: This is a pretty neat little temple complex.  Yes, it's still being used for ceremonial purposes, so you may see monks wondering about.  All of the buildings are clean inside and out.  There are also cats and roosters that roam the ground.  This place is a little out of the way of the main tourist areas, so it was quiet when we visited.You're required to take your shoes off when entering the buildings, and of course the normal 'temple attire' dress is required.  Would go again.
